With the help of the APP LingoLearn, those who desire to learn English and Chinese can fast advance in their language skills.\\n\\n YEW KOK WEI(Leader) \\n \\t\\t *Expertise: Director CEO \\n \\t\\t *Email: yewkw@gmail.com \\n\\n TEH KHAI WEN \\n \\t\\t *Expertise: Director COO \\n \\t\\t *Email: khaiwenteh@gmail.com \\n\\nOur team, which included TARUMT students YEW KOK WEI (Leader) and TEH KHAI WEN, created this app for the MAD (Mobile App) topic.

Our Company :\n\nLingoLearn is a company that helps improve Quality Education. Our app is currently working on several modules that allow people to quickly improve their language skills. We also sell some stationery that can be used by everyone when there is no cell phone state.
